name: Rhino Rampage
description:
You’re exploring the vast wilderness of Rhinoa when you’re suddenly surrounded by wild animals. Use this coconut to get the giant rhino to ram the animals away and don’t get bounced out of the arena!

 

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Space bar to throw the coconut

 

Coding by Roelof Tennekes

Art, sound and music by Bart Tennekes

Experiencing lag? Try downloadable version instead!
